Name: Files - Serve Upload
Description: Stream raw file from server uploads directory for inline display.

Name: Files - GridFS Image
Description: Serve stored image/file from MongoDB GridFS.

Name: Files - Uploaded Document
Description: Serve PDF document stored on disk with inline headers.

Name: System - Health Check
Description: API health probe with timestamp and environment info.

Name: System - API Root
Description: Basic metadata listing of main API groups.

Name: Auth - Register User
Description: Create a new user; admin role auto-applied for whitelisted emails.

Name: Auth - Login
Description: Email or wallet/password login with lockout protections.

Name: Auth - Current User
Description: Fetch authenticated user profile and derived flags.

Name: Auth - Verify Wallet
Description: Demo wallet signature verification to issue JWT.

Name: Auth - Refresh Token
Description: Issue a fresh JWT if the existing session is active.

Name: Auth - Logout
Description: Log out (stateless) for audit purposes.

Name: Users - Submit Verification Docs
Description: Upload Aadhaar/PAN/DL/Passport documents for verification (multipart).
Body: Multipart fields: aadhaarCard, panCard, drivingLicense, passport + numbers

Name: Users - Pending Verifications
Description: List users awaiting manual verification review (admin only).

Name: Users - Verify User
Description: Admin approve or reject a user and mark verified documents.

Name: Users - List Verified
Description: Fetch all verified citizen accounts.

Name: Users - Get Profile
Description: Return detailed profile for the authenticated user.

Name: Users - Update Profile
Description: Update name, phone, and address information.

Name: Users - Statistics
Description: Admin overview of total/pending/verified/rejected users.

Name: Users - Verify User Debug
Description: Admin helper to fetch and validate user ID inputs.

Name: Users - Get User By ID
Description: Fetch raw user record by path/userId (debug).

Name: Users - Toggle Liked Land
Description: Add or remove a land from favorites and return like count.

Name: Users - Get Liked Lands
Description: Paginated list of liked lands that are currently for sale.

Name: Users - My Listings
Description: Retrieve lands owned by the user that are listed for sale.

Name: Lands - Add Land Record
Description: Admin adds cadastral land data with optional original document upload.

Name: Lands - Digitalize Document
Description: Generate QR-backed certificate and upload to IPFS for a land.

Name: Lands - Admin Listing
Description: Admin filterable list of lands (location, price, status).
Body: Query: page, limit, district, state, landType, isForSale, assetId, verificationStatus, minPrice, maxPrice, minArea, maxArea, sortBy, sortOrder

Name: Lands - Get By DB ID
Description: Fetch land with populated owner/digitalization metadata.

Name: Lands - Search By AssetId
Description: Find a land using its public assetId.

Name: Lands - Claim Ownership
Description: Verified user claims an unowned, verified land.

Name: Lands - List For Sale
Description: Owner lists land for sale with price, description, features, and images.
Body: Multipart images + fields: askingPrice, description, features[], nearbyAmenities[]

Name: Lands - Update Listing (Multipart)
Description: Owner updates listing details and image gallery.
Body: Multipart images + fields: askingPrice, description, features, nearbyAmenities, existingImages[]

Name: Lands - My Lands
Description: Paginated lands currently owned by caller with filters.
Body: Query: page, limit, status, isForSale, sortBy, sortOrder

Name: Lands - Marketplace
Description: Public marketplace of lands for sale, includes like counts.
Body: Query: page, limit, minPrice, maxPrice, district, state, landType, minArea, maxArea, sortBy, sortOrder

Name: Lands - Legacy For Sale
Description: Legacy listing endpoint backed by Land.findForSale().
Body: Query: page, limit, minPrice, maxPrice, district, state, landType, minArea, maxArea, sortBy, sortOrder

Name: Lands - Nearby Search
Description: Geo search for lands within maxDistance meters of lat/lng.

Name: Lands - Verify QR Asset
Description: Return verification payload for QR/assetId scans.

Name: Lands - Download Certificate
Description: Download digital ownership certificate PDF from IPFS.

Name: Lands - Download Original Document (Public)
Description: Download original uploaded deed from IPFS.

Name: Lands - Document Status
Description: Check whether original/digital documents exist on IPFS.

Name: Lands - Owned By User
Description: Admin or self lookup of lands owned by a specific user.

Name: Lands - Edit Listing
Description: Owner-only JSON update of listing info (price, description, features).

Name: Lands - Remove Listing
Description: Owner removes listing and sets land back to available.

Name: Lands - Land Details
Description: Detailed land view with owner and verification info.

Name: Lands - Download Certificate (Owner Fallback)
Description: Owner downloads certificate from local uploads directory.

Name: Lands - Download Original (Owner Fallback)
Description: Owner downloads original document from local uploads directory.

Name: Transactions - Initiate Purchase
Description: Buyer initiates purchase against a land listing (locks land).

Name: Transactions - Upload Documents
Description: Buyer or seller uploads up to 5 supporting documents (multipart).
Body: Multipart files[] named documents; path param :transactionId

Name: Transactions - Pending Review
Description: Admin queue of transactions waiting for review.

Name: Transactions - Review
Description: Admin with 2FA approves or rejects a transaction.

Name: Transactions - My Transactions
Description: List all transactions where the user is buyer or seller.

Name: Transactions - Get By ID
Description: Fetch transaction details (buyer/seller/admin/auditor).

Name: Transactions - Verify Certificate
Description: Public verification of a completed transaction and certificates.

Name: Transactions - Land History
Description: Full transaction history for a given land.

Name: Chat - Start Conversation
Description: Buyer opens chat with seller for a land listing.

Name: Chat - My Chats
Description: List chats where caller is buyer or seller.

Name: Chat - Get Chat
Description: Fetch chat thread; marks other-party messages as read.

Name: Chat - Send Message
Description: Send text/offer/counter/acceptance messages inside a chat.

Name: Chat - Make Offer
Description: Buyer convenience endpoint to send price offer message.

Name: Chat - Counter Offer
Description: Seller counter-offer message with amount.

Name: Chat - Accept Offer
Description: Accept the currently pending offer and mark chat as deal agreed.

Name: Audit - Logs
Description: Auditor filtered audit log list with pagination.
Body: Query: startDate, endDate, action, performedBy, targetResource, page, limit

Name: Audit - Statistics
Description: Auditor KPIs for users, lands, and transactions in date range.

Name: Audit - Export Report
Description: Generate PDF audit report for selected date range.

Name: Audit - Recent Activity
Description: Latest activity feed limited by query parameter.

Name: 2FA - Setup
Description: Protected endpoint to start TOTP setup via controller.

Name: 2FA - Verify
Description: Validate TOTP token and enable 2FA using controller.

Name: 2FA - Disable
Description: Disable 2FA after verifying token via controller endpoint.

Name: 2FA - Status
Description: Check whether user has 2FA enabled and backup codes available.

Name: Buy Request - Create
Description: Buyer creates a buy request tied to chat and agreed price; seller must have 2FA.

Name: Buy Request - Get By Chat
Description: Buyer or seller fetches buy request details for a chat.

Name: Buy Request - Seller Confirm
Description: Seller confirms buy request using TOTP code.

Name: Buy Request - Resend 2FA
Description: Seller regenerates buy-request-specific 2FA code (dev mode returns code).

Name: Buy Request - My Requests
Description: List all buy requests involving the authenticated user.

Name: Buy Request - Cancel
Description: Buyer or seller cancels a buy request, optionally with reason.

Name: Admin Tx - Pending Queue
Description: Admin view of buy requests waiting for approval.

Name: Admin Tx - Transaction Details
Description: Admin fetches full details for a buy request pending approval.

Name: Admin Tx - Approve
Description: Admin approves buy request, triggers land transfer + optional blockchain hash.

Name: Admin Tx - Reject
Description: Admin rejects buy request with mandatory reason.

Name: Admin Tx - All Transactions
Description: Paginated view of all buy requests with optional status filter.

Name: Admin Tx - Stats Overview
Description: Aggregate counts and total agreed value grouped by status.
